title: Large alcove apt, balcony, rooftop, laundry, doorman
posting_body: ['Upper East Side sun-filled large alcove studio apt, south facing, with large tiled balcony, hardwood floors, ample closets.', 'You can easily see East River/Carl Schwartz Park on your left and Central Park on your right from your balcony.', 'This doorman full service building offers double- decked planted rooftop, large beautiful and green courtyard, and laundry in the building.', 'Walking distance to East River running path and promenade and Central Park loops.', 'Available as of August 10, 2022.', 'Located at 233 East 86th, 12A, New York, NY 10028, between 2nd and 3rd Ave on East 86th Street, between two major subway stations (4,5,6 and Q).', '1- minute walking distance to some of the most popular restaurants and entertainments on the most trendy area of Upper East Side.', 'Within one block of Whole Foods and Fairway Market.', 'Within blocks from Metropolitan Museum of Art and Guggenheim, 5- minute walking distance to Central Park.']
